title: Binomial Coefficient Calculation Tutorial
description: In this lab, you will learn about the binomial coefficient, a mathematical concept used in probability theory and combinatorics, and write a Python function to calculate it using the `math.comb()` method.

meta.title: Binomial Coefficient Calculation | Mathematics | Combinatorics
meta.description: Learn how to calculate the binomial coefficient, a fundamental concept in probability theory and combinatorics, using Python's math.comb() function.
meta.keywords: binomial coefficient, probability, combinatorics, mathematics, python
